name: mirage festival
description:
Mirage Festival is a web experience that pays tribute to the event that took place in Lyon for 8 years, promoting artistic innovation and digital creation. Our goal was to offer a digital experience inspired by the 2019 exposition, so that people could get a taste of the event from their own home.
Our team, regrouping 2 developers and 2 designers, created this project over the course of two weeks in December 2020, as an assignment for my Bachelor’s degree at Gobelins.

name: specimen BDDI
description:
Specimen BDDI is a website that offers a fun way of discovering the BDDI (Bachelor Développeur et Designer Interactif) class of 2021. This project’s goal was to learn about data visualization as a pair of 1 designer and 1 developer, through the theme of our choice. We decided to depict our class through the average specimen : Specimen BDDI.
We created this project over the course of one week in October 2020, as an assignment for my Bachelor’s degree at Gobelins. It is only a proof of concept : we focused on creating a few graphs, viewable through the computer and the phone icons.

name: little nightclub
description:
Little Nightclub is a fun web experience that allows the user to clap to a rhythm and see a character dance to a music of the same rhythm. My goal was to discover 3D for the web, and make use an unusual user input : the microphone.
I created this project over the course of one week in September 2020, as an assignment for my Bachelor’s degree at Gobelins.

name: peaceful field
description:
Peaceful field is a small web experience immersing the user in a peaceful field of grass, swaying in the wind.
I created this project in June 2021 as a practice Three.js and shaders.
